Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to be criticized by some because it has very little action in it, which is somewhat true. However there are some very funny moments here and some really entertaining scenes and it is acted well enough that you can suspend disbelief and enjoy it for what it is, a humorous excursion.
